event.title: was consolidated into Huntington County Community High School, now

data.event: The former Salamonie Township High School was consolidated into Huntington County Community High School, now known as Huntington North High School, in 1966.

event.title: known as Huntington North High School, in 1966

data.event: The former Salamonie Township High School was consolidated into Huntington County Community High School, now known as Huntington North High School, in 1966.
